content: Love the ability to track and compare my powerzone rides.

Fantastic app to be able to analyze and track your Peloton ride data. My favourite features - 1) Being able to compare my performance when I take the same ride multiple times. It's especially fulfilling to be able to see my fitness improvement over time. 2) Having an at-a-glance view of all my PRs ranked in order and grouped by length of the ride and being able to access the info/graph of the PR rides right away. These features fill a hole left by the official Peloton tablet/app. Even though the name refers to Power Zone training, the features of the app can apply to any and all types of Peloton rides. The developer is passionate about his app and it shows with his quick and detailed responses to any questions or concerns with the app. It sounds like there are some exciting features on tap for Version 2.0 and I can't wait! For anyone hesitant to pay for the full version, go for it, you won't regret it!
Best app handsdown. Easy to navigate too.
Love how clearly this app displays all the various metrics for a workout. Is there a way to compare the exact same workout for when you take it at a later date to see improvement?

Pretty minimal features, especially when compared to mPaceLine. That being said, the developer is actively working on the app so hoping it improves over time. Some gotchas: (1) all values are plotted on the same y-axis (2) no HR zone plots (3) comparison is only for output Comparison is bugged at the moment where the current ride you click compare on doesn't show up in the list of rides to select and view (dev is aware and fixing)
I have to uninstall and re install every time I use this to update my rides for some reason
unable to login after last app update. hoping the app isnt quitting on me now. 😫

Had an issue with the app crashing, reached out to the developer and it was fixed the same day. That's simply outstanding. I have found this app to be an indispensable part of my training program. It's easy to use and has great functionality.
Great app for Peloton users. Had a small login issue and the developer was super responsive and fixed it in less than a day.

I love this app! I had an issue with it not updating my FTP showing my most recent data, BUT, I emailed support, and David responded so quickly and resolved it in a very short time. I'm truly impressed with customer service and how quickly my issue was taken care of!! Thank you - Michelle

Great app! This is an awesome resource for those with android devices. I have one question. Can I access my graphs through the web on my PC? If so, how. If this isn't a feature, I recommend the developer consider adding it. Thanks! update to 4 stars. where is the summer powezone challenge? Is there a plan to continue integrating the powezone challenges into this app?

Love the app, but it has not been updated again since the great purge of rides recently. Zone Wars is still using the old challenge plan and really hoping this will be updated to the new rides soon. Thanks!
Great app. Would love the ability to track power to weight ratio by manually inputting weight at FTP test.

I read "Android Users" and thought I would be able to get power data through the Digital App. You must be a Peloton owner to use this. Update: The developer contacted me shortly after I posted. Great response and he cares about his product, as you can see in his other comments. I look forward to a version I could use with my Keiser M3i 's
Edit: Got some clarification. Moving review to a four until I can test out the compare funcionality. Great response time from dev team. Props to that.
I just downloaded the app and paid the extra $10 but my graph doesn't have the zones on it. It is just solid red without the colors or numbers for the zones. please help

Excellent companion for the Peloton Power Zone training. A must have for android users wanting to track TSS and current challenges. Highly recommend you pay the $10 to upgrade because you only get 10 rides synced in the free version.
Must have if you like the pretty graphs for Peloton Power Zone training. Would love an update for it to pull over info from the Peloton Tread too.
updated review . it's worth to buy this app if you are into power zone training .
I am so impressed with this app. It has exceeded my expectations.

Must buy! I purchased this to expand on my power zone training and I am so happy to have this. The graphs are easy to read and load quickly. I love having the comparisons from past rides to help me gauge my progress. This app is worth every penny!
it works great! one big issue. on my phone it pops up randomly and opens the app like 5 times a day. maybe more. a bit distracting.

works perfectly and has awesome features. i like being able to see past rides as well as join current power zone challenges and see my tss, power etc. it just allows me to gauge my improvement more easily!
great app for Peloton users. easy to read graphs, ability to track challenges, track performance. support and service are amazing. best money i have spent on an app
Grafts take several hours to load after completion of ride
A great complement to the Peloton to help track power zone training. Only a four because the functionality remains in development, but impressed so far and look forward to what's to come.

Peloton users with Android phones and tablets finally have a worthy Power Zone graph app! Developer is super responsive to suggestions for improvements. Already has a ton of unstated capability to view progress with Power Zone training. Already a great deal, this app will just keep getting better and better. Very pleased!
amazing program. perfect addition to peloton application

I am no longer in graph envy! I am so excited to have a power zone graph app to see rides, improvements, comparisons, personal records, and other fun stats. This integrates seamlessly with Peloton and even shows me my most taken instructor. I really love the "compare" button that automatically pops up if I've ever taken a ride before so I can see how well I've improved. THANK YOU for creating this android app, I'm loving it.

Finally an app compatible with Android! This app assists in Peloton Powerzone training as well as allows me to see overall progress through a variety of analytics. It is straightforward and easy to use. Nice graphics. Has everything I need. THANK YOU for creating this!!!!!
Thank you so much for an android app! As soon as I figure out how to delete a ride, it'll be perfect! I love the vibrant colors and how quickly everything loads!

As an android user in love with Peloton and power zone training this app had made my day! Love the graphics, the FTP charting is my favorite and it's dynamic. The development team has been responsive to requests and seems to really care. Highly recommend, it'll help step up your PZP game.

Peloton has always been an iOS first setup. This app brings powerzone maps to android for the first time. The Best part is that the dev listens to feedback and quickly adjusts accordingly. On initial release we seem to be at parody with the apple app. So I'm excited to see what the future brings

Fantastic app with seamless integration with Peloton data! I love how you can track your FTP tests over time and the compare feature (both things that you can't do with the Peloton tablet itself). Mad props to the developer for this valuable tool for Power Zone training!!!
Great app for Android peloton power zone users! So awesome having this functionality of my PZ data. Thank you so much!!
Great app and a great development team who appreciates honest feed back and adds new viable features often. Great value.
